content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Electricity Generator at position(x)
Consists of steam engine (position x) and boiler (position y) connected to an offshore pump (position z).

### Copper Cable Factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Check that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients and fuel before expecting them to operate.
